text: Highly articulate back-end developer with wide range of  experience in trenches available for hire on contract. Has predominantly worked with Python, Django, MySQL, Postgres, Redis, AWS Services, Mongodb, Celery, ZeroMQ, REST APIs, JSON. Currently residing in Delhi, India (UTC + 5:30), willing to work in clients timezone. Technology in this case is not a barrier as long as product and business model is sound. He is ready to furnish resume, code samples and references. Visit profile to get his email address.
